text: The duration of anti - infective treatment was significantly longer in the IVIG group than that in the control group ( control , median 12 days ; 2 - 40 days ; IVIG , median 18 days ; 3 - 65 days ; t test , log - transformed data , p = 0 . 0096 ) . Six patients in the control group and four patients in the IVIG group underwent anti - infective treatment before admission to the ICU . Excluding these patients , the duration of anti - infective therapy relative to LOS in the ICU was not significantly different between the groups ( control median , 71 % fraction of LOS ICU ; IVIG , 79 % of LOS ICU ) .
